doc.name: scriptExecutionError
doc.summary: The scriptExecutionError message is sent to the global script (home stack) when an uncaught error is encountered.

description.overview:
The scriptExecutionError message is sent to the global script (home stack) when an uncaught error is encountered.
ScriptExecutionError is only available when running in CGI mode (Server).

parameter.name: pErrorStack
parameter.description: Is the standard engine error stack listing, detailing the errors that occurred at each stage of the stack being unwound.

parameter.name: pFIlesList
parameter.description: The list of all files that have been 'included' / 'required' which the error stack references if an error occurred in the context of a file script rather then an object script.
